com.palomamobile.android.sdk.core.qos

Interface IRetryPolicyProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRetryPolicyProvider

    public interface IRetryPolicyProvider
    Provides centralized control over job retry policy.

                                     Throwable throwable,
                                     int runCount,
